item.title: CVE-2023-36496|2024-02-01T23:00:03.660Z -- ping%20identity -- pingdirectory
item.description: Delegated Admin Privilege virtual attribute provider plugin, when enabled, allows an authenticated user to elevate their permissions in the Directory Server.
